synopsis: Hideki's a farmer who dreams of being a rock star. When his band - Nerima Daikon Brothers - scores an audition with a touchy-feely industry big shot, he learns just how ruthless and creepy the music biz can be!

title.jp: Sa Rang Hey Yo With My Balls

synopsis: Nerima's new pachinko parlor is causing a stir among the city's older ladies. The place is staffed by cute boys, and when Ichiro learns that not everything is as it seems, he and the gang devise a profitable plan.

title.jp: My Shot Will Crash Into Your Backside

synopsis: Hideki and Ichiro are buried beneath a mountain of medical bills! When they take on an army of crazed nurses and the devious hospital director, a flatulent free-for-all ensues!
Yukika, a police detective, is digging for answers in Nerima, and the Nerima Daikon Brothers are drilling for gold beneath the police station. Before long, all of them are on the run from the Yakuza!

Kabukicho's new Host is dreamy, but his nightmare of a wife rules their household with an iron fist - literally! Tears are going to flow when the Nerima Daikon Brothers try to steal her stash of cash.

A regular at Ichiro's club is a TV psychic who claims to make dreams into reality. When Mako seeks the soothsayers help in becoming an idol, she finds that supernatural shortcuts to stardom don't come cheap!

Hideki hires a lawyer to find a way around the law that's keeping him from his love, Mako.  When the attorney ends up being as crooked as he is costly, the band pays a visit to the lawyer's fancy yacht.

title.jp: My Dirt-Cheap Rocket Is About to Launch!

synopsis: Hideki wants to get serious with Mako - he even buys a ring. Unfortunately, it seems Mako has eyes for someone else. Meanwhile, the owner of a discount store might behind the recent wave of vanishing hosts!

title.jp: Cook Up an Erection in Mine!

synopsis: A detective with a panda fetish cracks the case of a fast-talking swindler who wants to build a home for boobs and baseball in the middle of the band's daikon field!

Mako meets a pop superstar who has undergone extensive plastic surgery. The famous musician wants to build a magical place for the children of the world - and he's eyeballing Hideki and Ichiro's field!
Desperate to get the band back together, Ichiro takes Widgett's advice and robs his first bank! Meanwhile, Mako ponders plastic surgery, and Hideki forgets where he hid the deed to the farm.

title.jp: My Finish! Take a Look at This!

synopsis: When the Daikon Brothers stand in the way of the government's efforts to privatize Nerima, the Prime Minister sends in an army of lion-hearted assassins to break up the band once and for all!
